author: sisbell
msg: The solution plugin now handles building a .NET solution specific to maven profile.

author: barrettj
msg: Undoing the rest of rev 511305 changes to metadata.  Adding the resource element causes the resource.properties file to not be placed in the resultant JAR file.
This breaks the JAXWSTests.  I will either figure out how to get the resource element back in or open a Jira to address it.  But for now,
the tests needs to run successfully, which means backing out the change.

author: hlship
msg: Add basic support for client-side validation.
Move PageRenderSupport from the services package to the root package.
Add a clientValidation flag to Form and BeanEditForm (which defaults to true).

author: taylor
msg: more documentation, information about user accounts
